sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './Guarantee.css'; const Guarantee = () => { const guaranteeItems = [ { icon: 'fas fa-chart-line', title: 'ROI Guarantee', description: 'If we don\'t deliver at least 200% ROI within 6 months, we\'ll work for free until you do - or refund every penny.' }, { icon: 'fas fa-clock', title: 'Timeline Guarantee', description: 'Your AI solution will be deployed in 8 weeks or less, or we pay you $1,000 for every week we\'re late.' }, { icon: 'fas fa-shield-alt', title: 'Performance Guarantee', description: 'Your AI system will perform as promised in our agreement, or we\'ll rebuild it from scratch at no cost.' }, { icon: 'fas fa-handshake', title: 'Satisfaction Guarantee', description: 'If you\'re not completely satisfied with our work within 30 days, we\'ll refund 100% of your investment.' } ]; return (
100% Risk-Free

Our Iron-Clad Guarantee

We're so confident in our ability to transform your business with AI, we're willing to put our money where our mouth is.

The "AI Success or It's Free" Promise

Here's our promise to you: If our AI implementation doesn't deliver measurable results that exceed your investment by at least 200% within 6 months, we'll either:

1

Continue working with you at no charge until you achieve the promised results

2

Refund 100% of your investment, no questions asked

Plus: You keep all the work, code, and systems we've built. That's how confident we are in our process.

{guaranteeItems.map((item, index) => (

{item.title}

{item.description}

))}

Why We Can Make This Guarantee

We've delivered 50+ successful AI projects with a 98% success rate
Our proven 8-week methodology has been tested across 12+ industries
We only work with businesses where we're 100% confident we can deliver results

Ready to Transform Your Business Risk-Free?

With our guarantee, you literally cannot lose. The only risk is waiting while your competitors get ahead.

No commitment. No risk. Results guaranteed.

); }; export default Guarantee;
